description: Blue Star (Amsonia tabernaemoontana 'Montana') is an amazing perennial plant species! It produces light blue blooms throughout the growing season with its blue-green foliage radiating brilliance. It is both a low-maintenance and fast-growing species, reaching heights of up to three feet and preferring full to partial sun. Its remarkable flowers are attractive to both pollinators as well as hummingbirds. With its strong, long-lasting woody stems, it also serves as a great addition to any garden border or perennial garden. Make sure you donâ€™t miss out on this amazing plant!
